trigger.name: At least one action has been skipped

item.name: Electric company electrometer estimate
item.description:
Estimated value of electric company electrometer. This value may differ from real value due to device restarts or incorrect measurements. This estimate is only useful when your Shelly 3EM is measuring power consumption on the main breaker.
For this value to show correct estimate, you have to take a note of how many Wh were on electric company electrometer when you reset Shelly 3EM data and put this value into macro {$EC_EM_CONSUMPTION}.

item.name: Status data
item.description: Collect data from Shelly device status API.

macro.description: Total value on your electric company electrometer in Wh at the moment you reset Shelly 3EM data.

trigger.name: At least one action has been skipped

item.name: Electric company electrometer estimate
item.description:
Estimated value of electric company electrometer. This value may differ from real value due to device restarts or incorrect measurements. This estimate is only useful when your Shelly 3EM is measuring power consumption on the main breaker.
For this value to show correct estimate, you have to take a note of how many Wh were on electric company electrometer when you reset Shelly 3EM data and put this value into macro {$EC_EM_CONSUMPTION}.

item.name: Status data
item.description: Collect data from Shelly device status topic.

macro.description: Total value on your electric company electrometer in Wh at the moment you reset Shelly 3EM data.

trigger.name: At least one action has been skipped

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Motion/bat.value)>10 and last(/Template Shelly Motion/bat.value)<=20
trigger.name: Sensor battery is low

item.name: Status data
item.description: Collect data from Shelly device status API.

trigger.name: At least one action has been skipped

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/bat.value)>10 and last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/bat.value)<=20
trigger.name: Sensor battery is low

item.name: Status data
item.description: Collect data from Shelly device status topic.

trigger.name: At least one action has been skipped

item.name: Status data
item.description: Collect data from Shelly device status API.

template.template: Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT
template.name: Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT

trigger.expression: change(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/actions_stats.skipped)>0
trigger.name: At least one action has been skipped

trigger.expression: change(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/cfg_changed_cnt)>0
trigger.name: System configuration has been changed

trigger.expression: change(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/cloud.connected)<>0
trigger.name: Cloud connection state has changed

trigger.expression: change(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/cloud.enabled)<>0
trigger.name: Cloud configuration has changed

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/meters-0.overpower)="true"
trigger.name: Overpower event has been detected

trigger.expression: change(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/mqtt.connected)<>0
trigger.name: MQTT connection state has changed

item.name: Status data
item.description: Collect data from Shelly device status topic.

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/overtemperature)="true"
trigger.name: Overtemperature event has been detected

trigger.expression: change(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/relays-0.ison)<>0
trigger.name: Relay state has changed

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/relays-0.overpower)="true"
trigger.name: Overpower event has been detected

trigger.expression: fuzzytime(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/unixtime,60s)=0
trigger.name: Time is out of sync

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/update.has_update)="true"
trigger.name: Update available

trigger.expression: change(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/update.old_version)<>0
trigger.name: Version has changed

trigger.expression: change(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/uptime)<0
trigger.name: Device has been restarted

trigger.recovery_expression: sum(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/sensor.motion,10m)=0 or last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/sensor.active)="false"
trigger.name: Motion detected

trigger.recovery_expression: sum(/Template Shelly Motion/sensor.motion,10m)=0 or last(/Template Shelly Motion/sensor.active)="false"
trigger.name: Motion detected

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly 3EM - MQTT/fs_free)>=last(/Template Shelly 3EM - MQTT/fs_size)*0.8 and last(/Template Shelly 3EM - MQTT/fs_free)<last(/Template Shelly 3EM - MQTT/fs_size)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor file system space is low
Sensor file system space is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly 3EM/fs_free)>=last(/Template Shelly 3EM/fs_size)*0.8 and last(/Template Shelly 3EM/fs_free)<last(/Template Shelly 3EM/fs_size)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor file system space is low
Sensor file system space is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/fs_free)>=last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/fs_size)*0.8 and last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/fs_free)<last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/fs_size)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor file system space is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/fs_free)>=last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/fs_size)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor file system space is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Motion/fs_free)>=last(/Template Shelly Motion/fs_size)*0.8 and last(/Template Shelly Motion/fs_free)<last(/Template Shelly Motion/fs_size)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor file system space is low
Sensor file system space is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/fs_free)>=last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/fs_size)*0.8 and last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/fs_free)<last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/fs_size)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor file system space is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/fs_free)>=last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/fs_size)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor file system space is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S/fs_free)>=last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S/fs_size)*0.8 and last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S/fs_free)<last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S/fs_size)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor file system space is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S/fs_free)>=last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S/fs_size)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor file system space is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly 3EM - MQTT/ram_free)>=last(/Template Shelly 3EM - MQTT/ram_total)*0.8 and last(/Template Shelly 3EM - MQTT/ram_free)<last(/Template Shelly 3EM - MQTT/ram_total)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor memory is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly 3EM/ram_free)>=last(/Template Shelly 3EM/ram_total)*0.8 and last(/Template Shelly 3EM/ram_free)<last(/Template Shelly 3EM/ram_total)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor memory is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/ram_free)>=last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/ram_total)*0.8 and last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/ram_free)<last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/ram_total)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor memory is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/ram_free)>=last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/ram_total)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor memory is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Motion/ram_free)>=last(/Template Shelly Motion/ram_total)*0.8 and last(/Template Shelly Motion/ram_free)<last(/Template Shelly Motion/ram_total)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor memory is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/ram_free)>=last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/ram_total)*0.8 and last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/ram_free)<last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/ram_total)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor memory is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/ram_free)>=last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S - MQTT/ram_total)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor memory is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S/ram_free)>=last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S/ram_total)*0.8 and last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S/ram_free)<last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S/ram_total)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor memory is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S/ram_free)>=last(/Template Shelly Plug and Plug-S/ram_total)*0.9
trigger.name: Sensor memory is low

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/sensor.vibration)=1 and last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/sensor.active)="true"
trigger.recovery_expression: sum(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/sensor.vibration,10m)=0 or last(/Template Shelly Motion - MQTT/sensor.active)="false"
trigger.name: Tampering detected

trigger.expression: last(/Template Shelly Motion/sensor.vibration)=1 and last(/Template Shelly Motion/sensor.active)="true"
trigger.recovery_expression: sum(/Template Shelly Motion/sensor.vibration,10m)=0 or last(/Template Shelly Motion/sensor.active)="false"
trigger.name: Tampering detected
